name: jssm
description: A Javascript finite state machine (FSM) with a terse DSL and a simple API.  Most FSMs are one-liners.  Fast, easy, powerful, well tested, typed with TypeScript, and visualizations. MIT License.

scripts.test: npm run make && npm run jest
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf docs && cd coverage && rm -rf cloc && cd .. && rm -f src/ts/jssm-dot.ts && rm -f src/ts/version.ts && rm -f *.d.ts && mkdir dist && mkdir docs && cd coverage && mkdir cloc && cd ..
scripts.peg: rm -f src/ts/jssm-dot.js && pegjs src/ts/jssm-dot.peg && node src/buildjs/fixparser.js && rm src/ts/jssm-dot.js
scripts.make: npm run clean && npm run makever && npm run peg && npm run typescript && npm run make_iife && npm run make_cjs && npm run minify && npm run min_iife && npm run min_cjs && rm ./dist/es6/*.nonmin.js
scripts.audit: text_audit -r -t major MAJOR wasteful WASTEFUL any mixed fixme FIXME checkme CHECKME testme TESTME stochable STOCHABLE todo TODO comeback COMEBACK whargarbl WHARGARBL -g ./src/ts/**/*.{js,ts}
scripts.vet: npm run eslint && npm run audit
scripts.build: npm run vet && npm run test && npm run site && npm run changelog && npm run docs && npm run cloc && npm run readme
scripts.clean_bench: npm run test && npm run benny
scripts.ci_build: npm run vet && npm run test
scripts.minify: mv dist/es6/jssm-dot.js dist/es6/jssm-dot.nonmin.js && terser dist/es6/jssm-dot.nonmin.js > dist/es6/jssm-dot.js
scripts.min_iife: mv dist/jssm.es5.iife.js dist/jssm.es5.iife.nonmin.js && terser dist/jssm.es5.iife.nonmin.js > dist/jssm.es5.iife.js
scripts.min_cjs: mv dist/jssm.es5.cjs.js dist/jssm.es5.cjs.nonmin.js && terser dist/jssm.es5.cjs.nonmin.js > dist/jssm.es5.cjs.js
scripts.site: cp src/site/* docs/ && cp -r src/assets docs/assets/
scripts.docs: typedoc src/ts/jssm.ts src/ts/jssm_types.ts src/ts/jssm_constants.ts src/ts/jssm_error.ts src/ts/jssm_util.ts src/ts/version.ts --options typedoc-options.js
scripts.changelog: rm -f CHANGELOG.md && rm -f ./src/doc_md/CHANGELOG.md && better_git_changelog -b && cp CHANGELOG.* ./src/doc_md/

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
